snippet: A more rapid withdrawal of U.S. troops from Afghanistan is being considered by the Obama administration, report Helene Cooper and Eric Schmitt. The faster pullout has been in the works for some weeks, they say, and reflects "a growing belief within...
abstract: A more rapid withdrawal of U.S. troops from Afghanistan is being considered by the Obama administration, report Helene Cooper and Eric Schmitt. The faster pullout has been in the works for some weeks, they say, and reflects "a growing belief within the White House that the mission there has now reached the point of diminishing returns.''

headline.main: Obama Administration Debates Faster Afghan Pullout
